subject: Attention Please
body:
Attention Please
Notification and Guarantee From. US BANKING ONLINE Stamp by
the General Manager and sign by U.S Treasury Department IMF
Guarantee to send your money back if you did not received
the funds to your account after pay this charge that stated
once you send the $50.00 today for the information via iTunes card or steam wallet card.
Your $20.9million, will definitely transferred to
 Your account whiting 30 minutes  with out any more charge, 
I give
you 100% of guarantee that this payment of $50.00 that you
will send will carry out the transfer  with out any
more charge
, if there any more require after sending this
$50.00 that I guarantee you i will take care of it and make
sure that you received your $20.9million as I promise.
So go and send the money there is no more charge after this
payment of $50.00 and I guaranteed you that if there any
more charge after sending this $50.00 I will paid it and
make sure that you received your $20.9million, remember that
after you send this fee today i will send your online web site
and you will transfer your funds online by your self. Or I
will transfer it in next 30 minutes
So proceed to Apple store around you and Buy the $50 steam wallet card or iTunes gift card and attach to our e-mail!!!,
We are waiting for your reply with the payment, copy. And
your name and account where to transfer the online
, a
After we confirm the fee I will open an online Banking and forward you the username and password which you will use to login and complete your transfer to your personal account, and make withdraw today!!!
YOURS FAITHFULLY,
Mr. Mark Cardy
US BANK ONLINE (R)
NEW GENERAL MANAGER

subject: Re: Attention Please
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Cardy,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's great to hear from the US Bank Online and I appreciate the guarantee provided by the General Manager and Treasury Department IMF.

I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message though. Could you please clarify what exactly this charge is for? And why do I need to purchase a steam wallet card or gift card from an Apple store?

Also, could you explain more about how the online banking system works? How secure is it and what measures are in place to protect my funds during transfer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Beverly

subject: Re: Attention Please
body:
Hello;



Thank very much for your update,



1.)    you are sending the requested fee of $50.00 iTunes card or steam
wallet card to obtain the needed documents to cover the total amount from
US Government, also to proof that you are owner of the funds,



2.)    once  the requested gift card is received, I will give you the
username and password and five Code that you will use to long in and
complete your transfer to your personal account, and start making withdraw
in next 20 minutes.



It will be appear into your personal account once transfer into your
account.



So I want you to go and send the requested fee and forward the copy of the
gift card also your address to avoid a mistake.

subject: Re: Attention Please
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. I'm a bit confused about the process you've described. Could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? Why do I need to send a gift card? And how does this relate to transferring funds into my personal account?

I'm also curious about the username, password, and five code you mentioned. What are these for exactly? 

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Beverly
